name: AutoML Classifier
description: A component that trains an AutoML Classifier model using auto-sklearn

name: AutoML Regressor
description: A component that trains an AutoML Regressor model using auto-sklearn

name: Linear Regression
description: A component that trains a Logistic Regression (aka logit, MaxEnt) classifier model using Scikit-learn

name: Logistic Regression
description: A component that trains an ordinary least squares Linear Regression model using Scikit-learn

name: MLP Classifier
description: A component that trains a Multi-layer Perceptron Classifier model using Scikit-learn

name: MLP Regressor
description: A component that trains a Multi-layer Perceptron Regression model using Scikit-learn

name: Random Forest Classifier
description: A component that trains a Random Forest Classifier model using Scikit-learn

name: Random Forest Regressor
description: A component that trains a Random Forest Regression model using Scikit-learn

name: SVC
description: A component that trains a Random Forest Regression model using Scikit-learn

name: SVR
description: A component that trains a Support Vector Regression model using Scikit-learn

name: KMeans
description: A component that trains a KMeans model using Scikit-learn

name: Isolation Forest
description: A component that trains a Isolation Forest model using Scikit-learn

name: Normalizer
description: A component that normalize samples individually to unit norm model using Scikit-learn

name: Imputer
description: A component for imputing missing values using mean, median or most frequent

name: Variance Threshold
description: A component that removes all low-variance features

name: Robust Scaler
description: A component that scale features using statistics that are robust to outliers

name: Feature Tools
description: A component that use Feature Tools library to Feature Engineering

name: Pre Selection
description: A component that removes all low-variance and highly correlated features

name: Simulated Annealing
description: A component that applies simulated annealing strategy to Feature Engineering

name: Transformation Graph
description: A component that uses a transformation graph strategy to Feature Engineering

name: Filter Selection
description: A component that removes selected features from the dataset

name: Recursive Feature Elimination
description: A component that performs feature ranking with recursive feature elimination based on a Random Forest estimator

name: Simulated Annealing
description: A component that find the best solution for either a global minimum or maximum

name: Transformation Graph
description: A component that uses a technique of exploring the possible solutions oriented by a graph to perform AutoFeaturing
